EditSurveyInfo.title: Survey title
EditSurveyInfo.subtitle: Survey subtitle
EditSurveyInfo.name: Survey name
EditSurveyInfo.nameHelperText: The name displayed on the survey URL-address. This can only include characters (a-z), numbers (0-9), hyphen (-) and underline (_).
EditSurveyInfo.author: Survey author / contact person
EditSurveyInfo.userFetchFailed: Failed to fetch users. Try again later.
EditSurveyInfo.adminsHelperText: Users besides the original author of the survey, who will have access to the survey answers and who can modify the survey.
EditSurveyInfo.mapUrl: URL for the Oskari map publication
EditSurveyInfo.mapUrlError: Failed to fetch map layers with given url. Check the url and try again later.
EditSurveyInfo.themeFetchFailed: Failed to access survey themes. Please try again later.
EditSurveyInfo.allowTestSurveyHelperText: Test survey will be published under its own url. Test survey answers are not saved.

EditSurveyEmail.enable: Enable sending reports of the survey answers via email
EditSurveyEmail.enableHelperText: If you enable sending answer reports via email, reports of individual respondent's answers will be send as pdf-reports to the mailing list described below. At the end of the survey, the respondent is asked for an email address where the answer report can be sent to.
EditSurveyEmail.autoSendToHelperText: The answer report will be sent as an attachment to each of these email recipients (in addition to the respondent)
EditSurveyEmail.infoHelperText: Additional information will be displayed on the front page of the answer report.

EditSurveyPage.name: Page title
EditSurveyPage.confirmDeletePage: Are you sure you want to delete this page? The action cannot be reversed.
EditSurveyPage.deletePageFailed: Error while deleting the survey page. Please try again later.

EditSurveyPage.warningNoMapUrl: Oskari map publication url has not been set.
EditSurveyPage.warningNoAvailableMapLayers: No available map layers found from the Oskari map publication.

SurveyPage.errorSurveyNotFound: Survey was not found, or it is not published. Please check the address and try again.
SurveyPage.errorFetchingSurvey: Error while accessing the survey. Please try again later.
SurveyPage.loadUnfinishedSuccessful: Previous answers were loaded successfully! You can now continue answering the survey.
SurveyPage.errorTokenNotFound: Previous answers were not found with the provided address. Please check the address and try again, or start the survey from the beginning.
SurveyPage.errorLoadingUnfinished: Failed to load previously stored answers. Please try again later.

UnavailableSurvey.surveyNotPublished: The survey is not available at the moment. Thank You for your interest on the survey!
UnavailableSurvey.treTopicalInfo: You can access topical issues of the city of Tampere from the link below.

NotFoundPage.pageNotFound: Survey not found. Please check the address and try again later.

CopyToClipboard.fail: Failed to copy the value to the clipboard. Please try again later.

SurveyStepper.errorSubmittingSurvey: Error while submitting the survey. Please try again later.

SaveAsUnfinishedDialog.description: You can save the unfinished survey by providing your email address. A link will be sent to your email, from which you can access your unfinished survey provided that the survey is still open.
SaveAsUnfinishedDialog.disclaimer: Your email address will not be stored or used for other purposes. Your answers will be taken into account only when you have finished answering the survey and submitted your answers.
SaveAsUnfinishedDialog.saveSuccessful: Your answers are saved successfully! You will soon receive an email with the link to continue the survey. You can now close your browser window. If you are using a public computer, please, remember to clear the browser's cache.
SaveAsUnfinishedDialog.errorSaving: Error while saving answers. Please try again later.

SurveyQuestion.answerLimitsMinMax: Choose a minimum of {min} and a maximum of {max} options

selectionHelperText.point: Draw point on the desired location by clicking the map on that location.
selectionHelperText.line: Start drawing by clicking the starting point on the map. Continue drawing by clicking on the next point on the map. Stop drawing by clicking the last point of the line again.
selectionHelperText.area: Start drawing by clicking the starting point on the map. Continue drawing by clicking on the next point on the map. Stop drawing by clicking the last point of the area again.

MapQuestion.confirmClearAnswers: Are you sure you want to clear all your map answers to this question?
MapQuestion.confirmRemoveAnswer: Are you sure you want to delete this answer?

ImageSection.openInNewTab: Open image on a new tab

DeleteSurveyDialog.warningMessage: Note! When the survey is deleted, all the response data related to the survey is also deleted. The response data is permanently deleted and it cannot be accessed anymore after the survey is deleted.
DeleteSurveyDialog.activateDeleting: To delete the survey, write the name of the survey to the field below
DeleteSurveyDialog.surveyToBeDeleted: name of the survey to be deleted

GroupedCheckBoxQuestion.helperText: Choose options from the groups listed below.
GroupedCheckBoxQuestion.helperTextMinMax: Choose a minimum of {min} and a maximum of {max} options.

SubmissionInfoDialog.title: Submit answers
SubmissionInfoDialog.text: If you want a copy of your answers, please write your email address in the provided field.

TestSurveyFrame.text: This is a test survey. Survey answers are not saved nor are any email reports sent.

EditSurveyTranslations.enableLocalisation: Allow publishing the survey with multiple languages
EditSurveyTranslations.provideTranslations: If the survey is ment to support different languages, the translations for each text are to be provided here. Fill in the translation to the missing fields on the list below.
EditSurveyTranslations.copyTextFields: Copy text fields to be translated to clipboard
